#### Results A

```{r}
# Read in data and tidy data
pacific_salamander <- read_csv("mack_creek_vertebrates.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  filter(species == "DITE") %>% 
  group_by(year, section) %>% 
  summarize(total_count = sum(vert_index))

pacific_salamander$section[pacific_salamander$section == "CC"] <- "Clear Cut"
pacific_salamander$section[pacific_salamander$section == "OG"] <- "Old Growth"

# Plot data
ggplot(pacific_salamander, aes(x = year, y = total_count))+
  geom_line(aes(color = section)) +
  theme_bw()+
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(1993,2017), expand = c(0,0))+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 14000),
                     expand = c(0,0))+
  theme(legend.position = c(0.2, 0.8), 
        legend.key = element_rect(fill = NA),
        legend.key.height = unit(5, "mm"),
        legend.key.width = unit(5, "mm"))
 # I am trying to get the legend to be transparent but it's not working! 
 
```
